stats.title: Powerful Online Tool Collection

searchTip.title: Can't find the tool you need?
searchTip.description: You can use the search function on the homepage to quickly find specific tools, or check our help center for more usage guidance.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions or suggestions? We'd love to hear your feedback.

form.title: Send Message
form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject
form.messagePlaceholder: Please describe your question or suggestion in detail...
form.submitSuccess: Thank you for your feedback! We will reply to you as soon as possible.

howToUse.question: How to use the tools?
howToUse.answer: Select the tool you need, upload your file, wait for processing to complete, then download the result. All tools have detailed usage instructions.

security.question: Are files secure?
security.answer: Yes, we use SSL encryption for transmission, and files are automatically deleted within 1 hour after processing to ensure your data security.

formats.question: What file formats are supported?
formats.answer: We support PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images, videos, and many other common formats. Please check each tool page for specific supported formats.

fileSize.question: Is there a file size limit?
fileSize.answer: Single file maximum support is 100MB. If you need to process larger files, please contact our technical support.

processingTime.question: How long does processing take?
processingTime.answer: Most files are processed within seconds to minutes, depending on file size and complexity.

support.question: How to get technical support?
support.answer: You can contact us via email, online chat, or by filling out the form above. We will respond to your questions within 24 hours.

help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Frequently Asked Questions and User Guides

q1.question: Are these tools free?
q1.answer: Yes, all our tools are completely free. You can use all features without registration or payment.

q2.question: Are my files safe?
q2.answer: Absolutely safe. We don't store your files, all processing is done in your browser, or files are deleted immediately after processing.

q3.question: What file formats are supported?
q3.answer: We support most common file formats including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, image formats (JPG, PNG, GIF, etc.), video formats (MP4, AVI, MOV, etc.), and more.

q4.question: Is there a file size limit?
q4.answer: To ensure optimal performance, we have certain file size limits. Most tools support files up to 100MB, with specific limits displayed on each tool page.

q5.question: How to contact technical support?
q5.answer: If you encounter any issues, you can send us an email through the contact page, and we'll respond as soon as possible.

tips.title: Usage Tips
tips.tip1: Make sure your file format is supported
tips.tip2: Check if file size is within limits
tips.tip4: Please be patient when processing large files

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you can't find the answer in the help center, feel free to contact us.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn about our mission and vision

hero.title: Building the Future of Online Tools
hero.subtitle: We are committed to providing users with the most convenient, secure, and efficient online tool experience
hero.description: Since our establishment, we have been dedicated to developing high-quality online tools to help users easily handle various file processing needs. Our platform brings together over 100 practical tools covering PDF processing, image editing, video conversion, text recognition, and data processing.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide users with simple, fast, and secure online tools, making file processing easy and convenient. We are committed to building the best free online tool platform.

points.accessibility: Make professional tools accessible to everyone
points.privacy: Protect user privacy and data security
points.innovation: Continuously innovate and improve user experience
points.free: Provide completely free services without any hidden costs

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the world's leading online tool platform, providing users with the most comprehensive and reliable file processing solutions, making digital work more convenient.

goals.comprehensive: Build the most comprehensive tool ecosystem
goals.intelligent: Integrate AI technology to enhance tool intelligence
goals.sustainable: Maintain sustainable development and continuous innovation

free.title: Completely Free
free.description: All tools are free, no registration or payment required
free.details: We believe that excellent tools should be accessible to everyone. All our tools are completely free with no usage limits or hidden charges.

secure.title: Secure and Reliable
secure.description: File processing is secure, no user data stored
secure.details: We use the latest encryption technology to protect your files. All processing is done locally or on secure servers, and files are automatically deleted after processing.

fast.title: Fast and Efficient
fast.details: Our team continuously optimizes algorithms to ensure the fastest processing speed. Most files can be processed within seconds.

easy.title: Easy to Use
easy.description: Intuitive interface, no learning curve required
easy.details: We design simple and intuitive user interfaces so that anyone can easily use our tools without any technical background.

stats.title: Platform Statistics
stats.description: Numbers that demonstrate our commitment to excellence

team.title: Our Team
team.description: We are a group of technology-loving developers committed to providing users with the best online tool experience.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly explore new technologies and solutions

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We pursue excellence in every detail

userFirst.title: User First
userFirst.description: User needs are our top priority

openness.title: Openness
openness.description: We welcome feedback and suggestions from users

videoTools.title: Video Tools - Free Online Video Processing Tool Collection
videoTools.description: Free online video tool collection, supporting video conversion, compression, cutting, merging, rotation, etc. Supports MP4, AVI, MOV and all major video formats, fast processing, safe and reliable.

imageTools.title: Image Tools - Free Online Image Processing Tool Collection
imageTools.description: Free online image tool collection, supporting image compression, resizing, cropping, rotation, filters, etc. Supports JPG, PNG, GIF and all major image formats, fast processing, safe and reliable.

pdfTools.title: PDF Tools - Free Online PDF Processing Tool Collection
pdfTools.description: Free online PDF tool collection, supporting PDF conversion, merging, splitting, compression, encryption, etc. Fast PDF document processing, safe and reliable, no software download required.

ocrTools.title: OCR Tools - Free Online Text Recognition Tools
ocrTools.description: Free online OCR text recognition tools, supporting image to text, PDF to text, handwriting recognition, etc. Supports multiple language recognition, high accuracy, fast and convenient.

home.title: Free Online Tool Collection - Image Processing, PDF Conversion, Video Editing Tools
home.description: Discover our comprehensive collection of free online tools. From image editing to document conversion, we provide high-quality, easy-to-use tools to simplify your workflow. Supports PDF, images, videos, OCR and 100+ tools.
home.keywords: free online tools,PDF conversion,image processing,video editing,OCR recognition,document conversion,online tool collection

about.title: About Us - Free Online Tool Platform
about.description: Learn about our free online tool platform, dedicated to providing users with high-quality, secure, fast file processing tools. No registration required, completely free to use.
about.keywords: about us,online tool platform,free tools,file processing,secure tools

contact.title: Contact Us - Free Online Tool Platform
contact.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact us. We are committed to providing users with the best online tool experience.
contact.keywords: contact us,customer support,online tools,technical support,user feedback

help.title: Help Center - Tool Usage Guide and FAQ
help.description: Check our help center for tool usage guides, frequently asked questions and technical support. Help you better use our free online tools.

sitemap.title: Sitemap - All Tools and Page Navigation
sitemap.description: Browse our complete website map to quickly find the PDF, image, video, OCR and document processing tools you need.
sitemap.keywords: sitemap,tool navigation,PDF tools,image tools,video tools,OCR tools

pdf.title: PDF Tools - Free PDF Conversion, Merge, Split, Compress
pdf.description: Professional PDF processing tool collection, supporting PDF to Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF merge split, compression, OCR recognition and other functions.
pdf.keywords: PDF tools,PDF conversion,PDF merge,PDF split,PDF compress,PDF to Word,PDF to Excel

image.title: Image Tools - Free Image Processing, Format Conversion, Background Removal
image.description: Powerful image processing tools, supporting image format conversion, compression, background removal, size adjustment, filter effects and other functions.
image.keywords: image tools,image processing,image conversion,background removal,image compression,image editing

video.title: Video Tools - Free Video Conversion, Compression, Editing, GIF Making
video.description: Professional video processing tools, supporting video format conversion, compression, cutting, merging, GIF making and other functions.
video.keywords: video tools,video conversion,video compression,video editing,GIF making,video cutting

ocr.title: OCR Tools - Free Image Text Recognition, PDF Text Extraction
ocr.description: High-precision OCR text recognition tools, supporting image text recognition, PDF text extraction, handwriting recognition, multi-language recognition.
ocr.keywords: OCR recognition,text recognition,image to text,PDF text extraction,handwriting recognition,multi-language recognition

documentData.title: Document Data Tools - Free Document Conversion, Data Processing, Developer Tools
documentData.description: Comprehensive document and data processing tools, supporting Excel, CSV, JSON conversion, text processing, developer tools, etc.
documentData.keywords: document tools,data processing,Excel conversion,CSV processing,JSON tools,developer tools

documentDataTools.title: Document & Data Tools
documentDataTools.description: Free online document and data processing tools. Convert, split, merge, count words, generate hashes and more.
documentDataTools.keywords: document tools, data processing, word counter, hash generator, CSV tools, text tools

intro.p1: Cookies are small text files stored on your device, sent by websites to your browser when you visit.
intro.p2: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience, analyze site usage, and provide personalized content. This policy explains how we use cookies and how you can control them.

thirdParty.title: Third-party Cookies
thirdParty.intro: Our site may include cookies from third-party providers that help us analyze site usage or provide additional features:

ga.title: Google Analytics
ga.desc: Used for website traffic analysis and user behavior statistics

cdn.title: CDN Service
cdn.desc: Used to accelerate content delivery and improve performance

thirdParty.note: These third-party services have their own cookie policies; we recommend reviewing their policies for details.

management.title: How to Manage Cookies
management.desc: Most browsers let you control cookie settings. You can block cookies or be notified when cookies are set. Disabling cookies may affect some site functionality.
management.chrome: Settings â Privacy and security â Cookies and other site data
management.firefox: Options â Privacy & Security â Cookies and Site Data
management.safari: Preferences â Privacy â Cookies and website data
management.edge: Settings â Cookies and site permissions â Cookies and stored data

necessary.name: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for basic website functionality and cannot be disabled.

functional.name: Functional Cookies
functional.description: These cookies enhance site features and personalization.

analytics.name: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors use the site to improve services.

marketing.name: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies track site activity to show relevant and personalized ads.
